*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Ayuntamiento of San Felipe, October 18, 1830. Advising organization of certain militia districts,*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*The *person_mentioned*militia men */person_mentioned*living on the *location_mentioned*Colorado river*/location_mentioned* and on *location_mentioned*Navidad */location_mentioned*and the *location_mentioned*east side of La Baca North of *person_mentioned*4th company*/person_mentioned**/location_mentioned* have not as yet been organised by the appointment of *person_mentioned*officers*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*Settlements */location_mentioned*are *location_mentioned*extending up the Colorado*/location_mentioned* in situations which are exposed to the *person_mentioned*Indians */person_mentioned*which affords a strong reason why that section of the *person_mentioned*militia */person_mentioned*should be organised without delay. The law requires that the elections for *person_mentioned*militia officers*/person_mentioned* should be ordered and presided by the *person_mentioned*Ayto*/person_mentioned*. I therefore take the liberty of calling your attention to this subject and recommend that immediate measure be adopted for the organization of those *person_mentioned*Militia men*/person_mentioned*, into a *person_mentioned*half company*/person_mentioned* or company according to their numbers in conformity with the law.*/p*
*p*God and Liberty *location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="10-18-1830">18 Oct. 1830*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin, Col. Commandant*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
